contents.title: Giffyglyph's Card Codex
contents.blurb:
Before setting out into adventure, a wise adventurer knows to prepare ahead to ensure they have the right tools for the dangers ahead—weapons, armor, equipment, and spells.

But as a player, how do you keep track of all your gear and condition effects? As a DM, how do you hand out treasure and rewards to your players? If you like to use physical cards in your D&D 5e games, then welcome to Giffyglyph's Card Codex.

This supplement contains a variety of printable cards and templates to help you run your D&D games more easily—condition cards, equipment cards, templates and more in both color and print-friendly variants. Build up your deck, brave hero, and head out into adventure!
features: Create your own deck of printable cards for 5e status effects and conditions.
Designs for both color and print-friendly card variants.
Basic card templates—create custom cards for your own table and D&D campaigns.
Not for Resale: These cards and templates are provided for personal use. Print them for use at your own gaming tables, but please don't use any of the artwork contained for resale or for profit.

adverts.title: Darker Dungeons
adverts.blurb: Want to make your D&D 5e campaign more deadly for your players? Then try Giffyglyph's Darker Dungeons, 150+ pages of modular rules, tweaks, and advice:
features: Manage equipment and gear with the Active Inventory system.
Track survival conditions in your game with hunger, thirst, and fatigue.
Add lingering wounds and injuries to combat.
Add risk to casting magic with magical burnout.
Create randomised characters and 0th-level rookies.
And more.

adverts.title: Roll20 Character Sheet
adverts.blurb: Want to play Giffyglyph's Darker Dungeons online with Roll20? Then try Giffyglyph's Roll20 Character Sheet, a fully-featured and automated sheet compatible with any 5e game:
features: A brand new layout and design.
6 carefully laid-out tabs, panels, and options.
Compatible with any D&D 5e game.
Full drag-and-drop compendium support.
Track your inventory using weight or slots.
Toggle Darker Dungeons modules on or off to suit your own game.
And more.

adverts.title: Monster Maker
adverts.blurb: Want to make some new D&D 5e monsters in just a few seconds? Then try Giffyglyph's Monster Maker, 60+ pages of monster tables, tweaks, and advice:
features: Swap challenge ratings for easy monster levels.
Build minions, elites, and solo monsters with simple monster stats.
Give monsters an identity with monster roles.
Add traits & powers for variety in your combat.
Use freeform attacks for dynamic encounters.
Build encounters in seconds with monster points.
Run multi-phase boss encounters.
And more.

adverts.title: Monster Maker App
adverts.blurb: Want to create some new monsters using your phone or computer? Then try Giffyglyph's Monster Maker webapp:
features: Create your own monster vault in a few clicks.
Build minions, standards, elites, & solos.
Apply monster roles for quick, balanced variety.
Save your monster vault for later use.
Customize monsters with traits, powers, & notes.
Export your vault monsters to share with others.
Build monsters in either quickstart or manual modes.
Works on phone, tablet, or computer with a mobile-friendly and fully-responsive layout.
And more.
